item.title: 科技股 "咽气"，美股低迷
item.description: 先进微设备公司（Advanced Micro Devices Inc.【原文：US stocks were muted on Wednesday as weak outlooks from Advanced Micro Devices Inc. and Super Micro Computer Inc. added to concerns over valuations.】

item.title: 马姆达尼的承诺与财政现实背道而驰
item.description: 纽约市当选市长佐赫兰-马姆达尼（Zohran Mamdani）在竞选期间承诺提供免费托儿服务和公共汽车，新建 20 万套经济适用房和市属杂货店，资金来源是向企业和富人增税或借贷。【原文：During his campaign, New York City Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani promised free childcare and buses, 200,000 new units of affordable housing and city-owned grocery stores, funded by raising taxes on corporations and the wealthy or borrowing.】

item.title: 法国在收到有关性玩偶和武器的投诉后暂停 Shein 的活动
item.description: 就在中国电子商务巨头申银万国在巴黎开设首家门店数小时后，法国政府于周三启动了暂停申银万国业务的程序。【原文：The French government started a procedure Wednesday to suspend the Chinese e-commerce giant Shein, just hours after it opened its first store in Paris.】

item.title: 销售业绩下滑后，Sonos 为扭亏为盈发布新战略
item.description: 在音响品牌 Sonos 公布季度收入好于预期之后，该公司新任首席执行官概述了全新的产品战略，这是继去年发布灾难性应用程序之后，该公司努力扭亏为盈的最新举措。【原文：Sonos Inc.’s new chief executive officer outlined a fresh product strategy after the audio brand reported better-than-expected quarterly revenue, the latest in the company’s effort to turn itself around following a disastrous app release last year.】

item.title: 美国ADP就业数据好于预期，美国国债下滑
item.description: 由于美国就业市场出现复苏迹象，加上对未来供应的担忧挥之不去，国债收益率下滑。【原文：Treasuries slipped as signs of resilience in the US jobs market combined with lingering concerns over future supply.】

item.title: UPS 飞机在肯塔基州坠毁，使今年的航空旅行死亡人数又增加了一例
item.description: 美国联合包裹服务公司（United Parcel Service Inc.【原文：The crash of a United Parcel Service Inc. cargo jet on Tuesday jet has added to a growing number of deadly or near-catastrophic air incidents, in what is shaping up to be among the deadliest years in the past decade for civil aviation.】

item.title: 波兰因通胀前景疲软将利率降至 3 年半低点
item.description: 波兰中央银行将利率降至三年半来的最低水平，原因是通货膨胀率的意外下降超过了对政府支出宽松的担忧。【原文：Poland’s central bank cut interest rates to the lowest level in three-and-a-half years as a surprise decline in inflation outweighed concerns over loose government spending.】

item.title: 新加坡法律赋予政府更多权力监管 TikTok 和 Facebook 内容
item.description: 新加坡国会通过了一项法律，赋予当局更多权力来阻止从 TikTok 到 Instagram 和 Facebook 等社交媒体平台上的有害内容，这是新加坡遏制网络危害的最新举措。【原文：Singapore’s parliament passed a law giving authorities more powers to block harmful content on social media platforms, from TikTok to Instagram and Facebook, the city state’s latest move to curb online harms.】

item.title: 特朗普关税案在美国最高法院受到挑战
item.description: 11 月 4 日，华盛顿的美国最高法院。摄影师：Pete Kiehart/Bloomberg【原文：The US Supreme Court in Washington on Nov. 4. Photographer: Pete Kiehart/Bloomberg】

item.title: 亚马逊将在巴西为努班克客户提供更多信贷服务
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）将为巴西金融公司 Nu 控股有限公司（Nu Holdings Ltd. ）的客户提供一系列特殊的支付选择，包括在这家电子商务巨头处购物的更多信用额度。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. will offer customers of Brazilian financial firm Nu Holdings Ltd. a slew of special payment options, including more credit to shop with the e-commerce giant, as online competition intensifies ahead of the holiday season.】

item.title: 美国将在至少几个季度内保持纸币和债券销售稳定
item.description: 美国财政部表示，在明年相当长的时间内都不会增加票据和债券的销售，这一决定将使政府越来越依赖票据来为预算赤字提供资金。【原文：The US Treasury indicated it’s not looking to boost sales of notes and bonds until well into next year, in a decision that will see the government increasingly rely on bills to fund the budget deficit.】

item.title: ADP 数据显示，10 月份美国公司新增就业岗位 4.2 万个
item.description: 10 月份，美国公司的就业人数有所增加，表明就业市场在连续两个月下降后有所企稳。【原文：Employment at US companies increased in October, signaling some stabilization in the job market after two straight months of declines.】

item.title: 南非商品热潮将蔓延至更广泛的经济领域
item.description: 据 Old Mutual 投资集团称，南非的大宗商品暴利有望渗入更广泛的经济领域，提振银行、零售商和地产股，因为强劲的价格改善了财政前景，并支持降低利率。【原文：South Africa’s commodity windfall is expected to seep into the broader economy, boosting banks, retailers and property stocks as stronger prices improve the fiscal outlook and support lower interest rates, according to Old Mutual Investment Group.】

item.title: 公司债券世界将迎来首次每日收盘拍卖
item.description: MarketAxess Holdings Inc. 正试图将快速发展的股票市场的一个特点引入相对平静的 9 万亿美元公司债券领域：每日收盘拍卖。【原文：MarketAxess Holdings Inc. is seeking to bring a feature of fast-twitch equity markets to the relatively sedate $9 trillion universe of corporate bonds: the daily closing auction.】

item.title: Khosla Ventures 和 Kleiner Perkins 支持人工智能初创企业 Reevo
item.description: 人工智能初创公司Reevo Inc.计划于本周三宣布，该公司已从包括Khosla Ventures和Kleiner Perkins在内的投资者那里筹集到8000万美元资金—；这笔融资使该初创公司的估值达到5亿美元。【原文：Artificial intelligence startup Reevo Inc. has raised $80 million from investors including Khosla Ventures and Kleiner Perkins, the company plans to announce Wednesday — financing that brings the startup’s valuation to $500 million.】

item.title: 阿布扎比向英国投资 200 亿英镑，2021 年承诺翻番
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，阿布扎比对英国的投资承诺已超过 100 亿英镑，尽管双边关系出现紧张迹象，但阿布扎比仍将两倍多的资金投入英国资产。【原文：Abu Dhabi has surpassed its £10 billion investment commitment to the UK, channeling more than twice that sum into British assets despite signs of strain in the bilateral relationship, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 石油交易商认为俄罗斯制裁影响不大
item.description: 本周的阿迪佩克会议围绕美国对莫斯科能源产业的最新限制展开讨论。【原文：Talk at Adipec this week has centered on the latest US restrictions on Moscow’s energy industry.】

item.title: 帝亚吉欧部门开始审查皇家挑战者班加罗尔队的所有权
item.description: 帝亚吉欧集团（Diageo Plc）的印度子公司联合烈酒有限公司（United Spirits Ltd.）已开始对其体育管理部门的投资进行审查，该部门在南亚国家流行的板球联赛中拥有班加罗尔皇家挑战者队（Royal Challengers Bengaluru）的特许经营权。【原文：United Spirits Ltd., the Indian arm of Diageo Plc, has begun a review of its investment in its sports management unit that owns the Royal Challengers Bengaluru franchise in the South Asian nation’s popular cricket league.】

item.title: Meta 因人工智能支出下滑，与 2022 年的 Metaverse 路线相呼应
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司为支持其人工智能雄心而开出的巨额支票，让一些投资者回想起几年前该公司因巨额元宇宙支出而导致股价瘫痪的情景。【原文：The huge checks Meta Platforms Inc. is writing to support its artificial intelligence ambitions are reminding some investors of the massive metaverse outlays that crippled the stock just a few years ago.】

item.title: 欧洲的自动驾驶汽车甚至还未起跑
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，Gian Volpicelli 报道欧洲在开发自动驾驶汽车方面的缓慢努力。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Gian Volpicelli reports on Europe’s slow effort to develop self-driving cars.】

item.title: 美国历史上最长停摆造成的持久经济损失
item.description: 美国经济通常会从政府关门中反弹。这次可能有所不同。【原文：The US economy typically rebounds from government shutdowns. This time might be different.】

item.title: 特朗普时代，"赌场式 "市场助推 Robinhood 实现 450% 涨幅
item.description: 自唐纳德-特朗普赢得大选以来，Robinhood Markets 公司一直是华尔街最大的赢家之一。但随着对高价股的担忧与日俱增，其天价估值将成为投资者分析周三财报时的首要考虑因素。【原文：Robinhood Markets Inc. has been one of Wall Street’s biggest winners since Donald Trump’s election victory. But with worries over expensive stocks growing, its sky-high valuation will be front-of-mind as investors parse Wednesday’s results.】

item.title: 尼日利亚对出售国营炼油厂以促进竞争持开放态度
item.description: 尼日利亚对出售国有炼油厂持开放态度，这是为促进由巨型丹格特炼油厂主导的行业竞争所做努力的一部分。【原文：Nigeria is open to selling state-owned refineries as part of an effort to boost competition in the industry, which is dominated by the giant Dangote Refinery.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长纳格尔驳斥通胀率低于 2% 的观点
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）驳斥了关于欧元区通胀率略低于 2% 目标的说法。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Joachim Nagel rejected suggestions that inflation in the euro zone is settling a little below the 2% goal.】

item.title: 中资微芯片制造商 Silex 考虑在斯德哥尔摩上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，微芯片制造商 Silex Microsystems AB 正在考虑最快于明年在斯德哥尔摩进行首次公开募股，在此之前，该公司最近进行了一次股权出售，将控制权从中国所有者手中移交给了瑞典投资者。【原文：Microchip maker Silex Microsystems AB is considering an initial public offering in Stockholm as soon as next year, according to people familiar with the matter, after a recent stake sale that handed control from a Chinese owner to Swedish investors.】

item.title: Nebius 发布可运行开放模型的平台，媲美微软
item.description: 人工智能云服务提供商 Nebius Group NV 正在发布一款新产品，旨在提供开源模型的访问权限以及运行这些模型的计算能力。【原文：Nebius Group NV, an artificial intelligence cloud provider, is releasing a new product meant to offer access to open source models and the computing horsepower to run them — part of a bid to capture a broader piece of the artificial intelligence boom.】

item.title: 对冲基金希望者接受多方协议以寻找现金
item.description: Arnaud de Lasteyrie 准备在 2017 年成立一家对冲基金，他面临着一个艰难的选择：是限制自己只为单一客户运作资金，还是继续追逐以赢得多样化的投资者。【原文：Preparing to launch a hedge fund in 2017, Arnaud de Lasteyrie faced a tough choice: limit himself to running money exclusively for a single client or keep chasing to win a diverse range of investors.】

item.title: 卡塔尔迪亚尔公司计划在埃及进行 35 亿美元现金投资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，一家卡塔尔国有房地产公司将在埃及进行 35 亿美元的现金投资，这是海湾地区对北非经济的最新支持。【原文：A Qatari state-owned real estate company will make a $3.5 billion cash investment in Egypt, according to people familiar with the matter, in the latest Gulf backing for the North African economy.】

item.title: 一份数十年前的名单限制了美国对欧盟债券期货的参与
item.description: 德意志交易所（Deutsche Börse AG）正在推动美国修改一份已有四十年历史的名单，以便向美国对冲基金开放欧盟的新债券期货。【原文：Deutsche Börse AG is pushing the US to make changes to a four-decade old list to open up the European Union’s new bond futures to American hedge funds.】
